item.title: James Chong's Blog
item.description: You’ve reached my blog! Welcome! This is my personal blog where I record what I have learnt and read throughout the years. Currently, I’m focusing on programming stuff and some books about finance. But maybe there will be more categories as I continue my journey of learning. There’s a motto that I love very much, which I heard from the youtuber Yes Theory: Seek Discomfort We should all be brave enough to step out of comfort zone and try seek discomfort few times a year.
